EmailTemplate.subject: Whitepaper: Unleash vCloud Director's Potential
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{{lead.first name:default=FACT}}:
VMware's vCloud Director packs tremendous potential for Service Providers and Enterprises, like {{company.Company Name:default=yours}}, to deliver agile and cost-effective Infrastructure as a Service (IaaS). This whitepaper addresses the cost benefits of vCloud deployment, and offers one major way in which you can favorably bend the cost curve 30% more <http://bit.ly/PkufRs>, while:
- Driving efficiency far above traditional DRS - Eliminating non-productive IT labor costs - Optimizing costs with multi-tenant reporting - Positioning for infinite IaaS scalability
As Bernd Herzog of The Virtualization Practice put it, "VMTurbo is delivering today, what is promised in VMwareâ€™s future strategy." Download the whitepaper <http://bit.ly/PkufRs>, and learn precisely what this means.
Ahead of the curve, VMTurbo
